pkgmetadata.longdescription: Predictor Identifier: Nonparametric Prediction // Partial informational correlation (PIC) is used to identify the meaningful predictors to the response from a large set of potential predictors. Details of methodologies used in the package can be found in Sharma, A., Mehrotra, R. (2014). doi:10.1002/2013WR013845, Sharma, A., Mehrotra, R., Li, J., Jha, S. (2016). doi:10.1016/j.envsoft.2016.05.021, and Mehrotra, R., Sharma, A. (2006). doi:10.1016/j.advwatres.2005.08.007.
